welcome.title: Welcome to Champagne Festival
welcome.subtitle: A celebration of fine champagne and community

whatWeDo.title: What We Do
whatWeDo.description: Our festival brings together champagne producers, enthusiasts, and the community for a celebration of this magnificent beverage.

feature1.title: Meet Producers
feature1.description: Meet producers from around the world and learn about their craft.

feature2.title: Taste Champagnes
feature2.description: Sample a wide variety of champagnes from different regions.

feature3.title: Join Our Community
feature3.description: Connect with fellow champagne enthusiasts and experts.

nextFestival.title: Next Festival
nextFestival.description: Join us for our next festival where we'll feature over 20 champagne producers from around the world.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.intro: Have questions or want to become a sponsor? Reach out to us!
contact.name: Your Name
contact.successMessage: Thank you for your message! We'll get back to you soon.

errors.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
